Package net.chaossquad.mclib.advancedgui.provider

Klasse WallGUIProvider

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.advancedgui.provider.WallGUIProvider
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
EntityManagingWallGUIProvider, SynchronizedScreen
public class WallGUIProvider extends Object
Provides utilities for easier handling of gui wall instances.
